content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The price we discussed was around 850 euros per month, but we could not come to an agreement on the deposit and additional fees.
name: Evaluator

content: I understand that you did not agree on a final price. Would you be willing to continue negotiating with Peter Schmidt in the future if the circumstances change?
name: Haoyu Wang
